name: breathing-text
description: Variable font breathing animation with staggered letter-by-letter weight transitions

props.name: as
props.description: HTML element type to render as

props.name: transition
props.description: Motion transition configuration for the animation

props.name: staggerDuration
props.description: Delay between each letter's animation start in seconds

props.name: staggerFrom
props.description: Direction from which the stagger effect originates

props.name: repeatDelay
props.description: Delay between animation repetitions in seconds
